title: Full-Stack Development Intern
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Intern (Unpaid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is dedicated to nurturing future\\-ready developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development skills aligned with real\\-world industry requirements.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will work across all layers of web development‚Äîfrom creating engaging user interfaces to building robust, scalable backend systems. This role is ideal for candidates seeking end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design and develop full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Integrate APIs and ensure smooth data flow between front\\-end and back\\-end systems
* Optimize application performance, security, and scalability
* Debug, test, and maintain codebases and repositories
* Collaborate with team members in an agile development environment



**Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js

* Strong logical thinking, problem\\-solving, and teamwork skills



**What You Will Gain**

* End\\-to\\-end exposure to real\\-world software development projects
* Mentorship and guidance from industry professionals
* Opportunity to strengthen a full\\-stack development portfolio
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

title: Developer I
description:
**Overview**
 We are seeking an experienced
 **Developer I** 
 with
 **3 years of IT experience** 
 and strong expertise in

 development. The candidate will be responsible for designing, building, and supporting integration solutions across enterprise applications, working both collaboratively and independently when required.

* 
+ Design and develop integrations using Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), including REST, SOAP, File, and Database adapters.
+ Implement integration solutions across ERP, HCM, CRM, and custom applications.
+ Develop Integrations using Oracle ATP and OIC Applications
+ Perform unit testing, debugging, and performance tuning of integration flows.
+ Provide support and troubleshooting for integration solutions in production environments.
+ Work independently when needed, taking ownership of assigned tasks.


**Qualifications**
* 3 years of IT experience with at least 2\\+ years in Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC).
* Hands\\-on expertise in building integrations using OIC adapters (REST, SOAP, FTP, DB, ERP, HCM).
* Experience with Oracle SaaS (ERP/HCM/SCM) integrations.
* Proficiency in XML, XSD, XSLT, JSON, and Web Services.
* Knowledge of Oracle SOA Suite, ICS, PCS, and related middleware technologies.
* Experience with API management, design, and security (OAuth, SAML, JWT).
* Strong debugging and performance tuning skills in integration flows.
* Experience with Oracle BI Publisher (BIP) for reporting.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work in cross\\-functional teams.
* Migration of Object such as BIP, OIC and ATP Components using VBS


**‚úÖ Preferred Qualifications**
* Oracle Certified Professional in Integration Cloud or related technologies.
* Experience with Oracle VBCS (Visual Builder Cloud Service) will be considered an added advantage.

title: Sr QA Automation
description:
**Job Title: Sr QA Automation (Java Selenium/ Playwright)
   

  

 Location: Remote ‚Äì India**
**Client Domain:** 
 Product\\-based company specializing in SaaS HRMS (Human Resource Management System) applications tailored for public sector organizations
   

  

**Job Summary**
 We are seeking a
 **seasoned Senior QA Engineer** 
 with a strong background in
 **both automation and manual testing** 
 , with proven expertise in
 **Selenium WebDriver** 
 and
 **Java\\-based test automation** 
 . This role is pivotal to ensuring the quality and reliability of our SaaS\\-based HRMS solutions. The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading QA efforts, driving test strategy, building scalable automation frameworks, and contributing to a high\\-quality Agile development environment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the end\\-to\\-end automation testing efforts using Selenium WebDriver with Java, and support key initiatives across manual testing workflows.
* Design, develop, and maintain robust, reusable test automation frameworks for web applications.
* Create and execute comprehensive test plans, test cases, and manual/automated scripts ensuring maximum coverage.
* Identify, isolate, and thoroughly document bugs, collaborating closely with developers for timely resolution.
* Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/GitHub Actions) and work closely with DevOps to streamline deployments.
* Perform cross\\-browser and cross\\-platform testing using tools such as BrowserStack or Sauce Labs.
* Conduct API testing (manual and automated) using Postman, RestAssured, or similar tools.
* Support performance testing efforts (using tools like JMeter) to ensure optimal application behavior under load.
* Champion best practices in BDD/TDD, test data management, defect reporting, and test metrics tracking.
* Actively contribute to Agile ceremonies (daily stand\\-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, demos).
* Stay updated on emerging test tools and technologies to improve QA strategy and implementation.
* Mentor junior QA engineers and ensure QA standards are consistently met across projects.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* 6\\+ years of experience in Software QA, with at least 3\\+ years in Selenium WebDriver automation using Java.
* Expertise in Java programming with strong OOP principles, especially in building automation scripts and frameworks.
* Solid hands\\-on experience with test automation frameworks: TestNG, JUnit, and BDD tools like Cucumber.
* Strong command of manual testing techniques, including exploratory, regression, functional, and integration testing.
* Proficiency with CI/CD tools: Jenkins, Git, Docker.
* Experience with API testing and validation using Postman, RestAssured, or similar tools.
* Knowledge of performance testing tools like JMeter is a strong plus.
* Experience testing in cloud\\-based or virtual test environments (BrowserStack, Sauce Labs, etc.).
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and DevOps practices.
* Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail and excellent problem\\-solving skills.
* Exceptional communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with cross\\-functional teams

title: Manager 1- SAP CPI Developer
description:
At Sun Pharma, we commit to helping you ‚ÄúCreate your own sunshine‚Äù‚Äî by fostering an environment where you grow at every step, take charge of your journey and thrive in a supportive community.
 



  





**Are You Ready to Create Your Own Sunshine?** 




  





 As you enter the Sun Pharma world, you‚Äôll find yourself becoming ‚ÄòBetter every day‚Äô through continuous progress. Exhibit self\\-drive as you ‚ÄòTake charge‚Äô and lead with confidence. Additionally, demonstrate a collaborative spirit, knowing that we ‚ÄòThrive together‚Äô and support each other‚Äôs journeys.‚Äù
 



  





**Job Summary:** 




 We are seeking an experienced SAP CPI Developer to lead and execute SAP Process Integration/Process Orchestration (PI/PO) to Cloud Platform Integration (CPI) migration projects as well as develop fresh interfaces. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both SAP PI/PO and CPI, with demonstrated experience in successful migration
 



 projects.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




  




* Design, develop, and maintain integration scenarios in SAP Cloud Platform Integration
* Perform detailed analysis of existing PI/PO integration scenarios
* Create and maintain technical documentation for integration flows
* Develop reusable integration content and best practices for CPI development
* Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues in both PI/PO and CPI environments
* Collaborate with business analysts to understand integration requirements and propose optimal solutions
* Ensure compliance with security standards and governance policies in cloud integration scenarios



  






 Expertise in:
 



* SAP Cloud Platform Integration Suite
* Integration Flow development
* Message mapping and transformation
* REST, RFC, AS2 and SOAP web services
* XML, XSLT, and JSON
* Groovy scripting
* OData services



**Educational Qualification** 
 : BSc.IT, BSc.CS, B.E.
 



  





**Specific Certification \\& Requirements:** 




  




* SAP CPI certification
* Experience with SAP S/4HANA integration
* Experience with Migration from SAP PI/PO to SAP CPI
* Knowledge of API Management and SAP API Business Hub
* Familiarity with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines
* Experience in integration with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, or GCP)
* Understanding of microservices architecture



  





**Experience** 
 : Minimum 5 years
 



  





**Skill (Functional \\& Behavioural):** 



* Good Communication Skill
* Self\\-starter \\& don‚Äôt wait for the direction on what to do?
* Customer focus
* Integrity
* Curiosity to learn new things



  





**Your Success Matters to Us** 




 At Sun Pharma, your success and well\\-being are our top priorities! We provide robust benefits and opportunities to foster personal and professional growth. Join us at Sun Pharma, where every day is an opportunity to grow, collaborate, and make a lasting impact. Let‚Äôs create a brighter future together

title: Azure Developer (NET Custom Web Dev & Logic Apps)
description:
Do you want to be part of an inclusive team that works to develop innovative therapies for patients? Every day, we are driven to develop and deliver innovative and effective new medicines to patients and physicians. If you want to be part of this exciting work, you belong at Astellas!
   

  

 Astellas Pharma Inc. is a pharmaceutical company conducting business in more than 70 countries around the world. We are committed to turning innovative science into medical solutions that bring value and hope to patients and their families. Keeping our focus on addressing unmet medical needs and conducting our business with ethics and integrity enables us to improve the health of people throughout the world. For more information on Astellas, please visit our website at www.astellas.com .
   

  

 This position is based in Bengaluru and will require some on\\-site work.
   

  

**Purpose And Scope**
 As a Microsoft .Net Engineer in Adobe.\\& Net Platforms, you will play a pivotal role in advancing our digital initiatives within our agile organization by designing and delivering innovative, enterprise\\-grade external facing web applications based on Microsoft .Net Framework and technologies. This role exists to architect, develop and maintain websites built on Microsoft .Net framework hosted on Azure cloud, enabling seamless content delivery and engagement of HCPs and Patients to Astellas owned web properties collaborating with cross\\-functional stakeholders both internal and external driving business value through technical expertise and stakeholder engagement aligned to enterprise capabilities. Our agile operating model‚Äîcomprising Digital Capability for skill growth and Digital Execution for mission\\-aligned collaboration‚Äîuniquely positions you to balance cutting\\-edge Microsoft search solution delivery with the development of specialized expertise, while expertise in other enterprise search platforms is welcomed as an advantageous complement.
   

  

 In this role, you will architect, design, develop, deploy, and maintain custom web applications on leveraging your experience and a deep understanding of Microsoft .Net, Azure logic Apps, and related Microsoft .Net Framework and Azure cloud tools to meet organizational needs. You will work directly with stakeholders to translate requirements into scalable Microsoft custom .Net and Azure logic app solutions, multitask across projects, mentor team members, and stay ahead of technological advancements, making this position critical for transformative digital impact within Microsoft .Net framework.
   

  

 You will be at the forefront of implementing innovative solutions and will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies in your field.
   

  

**Essential Job Responsibilities**
* Architect, design, develop and deploy advanced enterprise web applications using Microsoft .Net Core and MVC, Microsoft SQL.
* Architect, design develop, deploy and maintain solutions on Azure Cloud (PaaS: including App Service, Azure functions, Logic Capps, Blob storage, Web apps )
* Conduct business analyses by engaging directly with stakeholders to understand custom web application related challenges.
* Design, develop websites to deliver customer experiences and engagement for brand teams.
* Develop web applications and Integrate with Web services sing Azure cloud and other enterprise Integration tools such as MuleSoft or other platforms.
* Develop integrations to handle data from websites residing on SQL server database.
* Provide expert\\-level technical support for Microsoft .Net Framework and Azure logic Applications and related tools, resolving issues with business users, delivery teams, external agencies, and vendors, applying Microsoft .Net platform knowledge.
* Performance Monitoring and Optimization: Regularly monitor web site performance using Lighthouse or similar tools.
* Security \\& Compliance: Ensure custom web solutions are secure and compliant with enterprise standards, including web governance and necessary documentation.
* Data Reporting: Work with reporting team (generating insights from Google Analytics or Adobe Analytics) to derive meaningful insights.
* Initiative Execution: Actively contribute to Microsoft .Net related initiatives, applying specialized skills to achieve the objectives and expected Value. Contribute to the ongoing realization of Value from these enterprise platforms through continuous integration and deployment.
* Collaboration and mentorship: Work collaboratively with team members within the subdivision and across other digital and business units. Mentor and guide team members with the same skills and technologies
* Continuous Learning: Engage in continuous learning and professional development to stay abreast of the latest trends and technologies in a specific area of expertise.
* Innovation: Contribute innovative ideas and approaches to enhance project outcomes and digital capabilities.
* Reporting: Regularly report on system use to your Capability Lead, VT captain, and team members.
* Problem\\-Solving: Employ analytical and problem\\-solving skills to overcome project challenges and deliver effective solutions.
* Quality Assurance: Ensure the highest quality and consistency in the work delivered.


**Qualifications Required**
* Bachelor's degree in relevant field, e.g., Computer Science, Data Science
* 10\\+ years of demonstrated engineering experience in designing and developing enterprise web solutions using C\\#, ASP.NET, and other related technologies, with a strong focus on Microsoft .Net Core, MVC and SQL Server.
* 3\\+ Years of experience in Azure PaaS(building App service, Web Apps, Azure functional, Logic Apps, Blob Storage, etc).
* Proven ability to perform business analyses, working directly with stakeholders to define and deliver search\\-focused technical solutions within the Microsoft ecosystem.
* Excellent understanding of object\\-oriented programming
* Proficiency in Microsoft .Net Framework for development and deployment including IIS Server, configuration, and management.
* Experience with CSR and SSL certificate renewal for websites
* Comprehensive working knowledge of related Microsoft and Integration technologies: Azure Functions, Azure Logic Apps, REST APIs, and integration with third party databases, platforms.
* Coding expertise in front end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS developing web applications.
* Strong understanding of relational databases, SQL, and data indexing within Microsoft platforms.
* Experience with Agile and DevOps methodologies, including Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipelines and version control in code deployments.
* Advanced problem\\-solving capabilities to troubleshoot and resolve issues across Microsoft applications, infrastructure, and deployment pipelines.
* Exceptional collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with development teams, business users, vendors, and external agencies.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to train and mentor others on Microsoft technologies.
* Adaptable to evolving project scopes and technologies, with a commitment to continuous learning in the Microsoft and Adobe domain.
* Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for security, scalability, and reliability.


**Preferred**
* Microsoft Certified: Microsoft .Net Developer, IIS administration, Azure Solutions Expert, Microsoft SQL.


**Working Environment**
* At Astellas we recognize the importance of work/life balance, and we are proud to offer a hybrid working solution allowing time to connect with colleagues at the office with the flexibility to also work from home. We believe this will optimize the most productive work environment for all employees to succeed and deliver. Hybrid work from certain locations may be permitted in accordance with Astellas‚Äô Responsible Flexibility Guidelines.


 Category PlatformX
   

  

 Astellas is committed to equality of opportunity in all aspects of employment.
   

  

 EOE including Disability/Protected Veterans

title: Senior Test Engineer (VTransact)
description:
* **Location:** 
 Khobar (Onsite)
* **Industry:** 
 Banking / Transaction Banking



  




**Role Summary** 

  





 We are seeking a
 **Senior Test Engineer** 
 with
 **mandatory hands\\-on experience in the VTransact transaction banking platform** 
 . The role involves end\\-to\\-end testing of corporate payments, collections, virtual accounts, reconciliation, and transaction banking workflows in a banking environment.
 



**Candidates without VTransact experience will not be considered.** 




  





  




**Key Responsibilities** 

  





**VTransact Functional Testing (Mandatory)** 




  




* Perform end\\-to\\-end testing of VTransact modules:
* 
* Corporate payments (single \\& bulk)
* Collections \\& receivables
* Virtual Account Management (VAM)
* Transaction lifecycle \\& status tracking
* Validate workflows including onboarding, virtual account setup, collections, payments, and exception handling.
* Test configuration rules for account mapping, routing, and prioritization.



  





**Integration \\& Payments Testing** 




  




* Validate integrations with Core Banking Systems.
* Test payment flows via local payment rails, gateways, APIs, and file\\-based uploads.
* Perform reconciliation testing across VTransact, core banking, and GL systems.
* Validate batch jobs, EOD processing, cut\\-offs, and real\\-time vs batch flows.



  





**Data Validation \\& Reporting** 




  




* Validate transaction postings, balances, virtual account mappings, and settlement reports.
* Perform data validation using
 **SQL** 
 .
* Validate MIS and operational reports for corporate, treasury, and operations teams.



  





**Test Ownership \\& Delivery** 




  




* Prepare test scenarios, test cases, execution evidence, and defect reports.
* Support SIT, UAT, regression, go\\-live, and post\\-production validation.
* Work closely with business users, developers, and vendors/system integrators.



  




**Mandatory Skills \\& Experience (Non\\-Negotiable)** 

  




* **7‚Äì10\\+ years** 
 of banking/financial services testing experience.
* **Hands\\-on testing experience on VTransact platform (mandatory)** 
 .
* Strong understanding of transaction banking, corporate payments, collections, virtual accounts, and reconciliation.
* Functional, integration, and UAT testing expertise.
* **SQL for data validation (mandatory)** 
 .
* API testing experience (Postman / SOAP UI).
* Experience with file\\-based formats (CSV, XML, ISO) and batch processing.



  




**Good to Have** 

  




* Experience with corporate banking or treasury systems.
* Exposure to GCC / Middle East banking environments.
* Onsite banking project experience.

title: Principal Engineer - AI Core Services Development
job_function: Information Technology, Project Management, and Consulting
description:
We are looking for passionate and skilled Software Developers to join our Core AI Services team. In this role, you will help design, develop, and scale AI\\-enabling platform services and public APIs that are secure, reliable, and cloud\\-native. These services will act as foundational building blocks for AI adoption across AVEVA‚Äôs product portfolio and partner ecosystem.You will part of a Scrum team to build innovative, standards\\-compliant, secure and production\\-grade AI capabilities, with a builder mindset \\- rapid prototyping and continuous improvement with agility of a start\\-up.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* Build scalable, fault\\-tolerant cloud\\-native services on Microsoft Azure, ensuring high performance and reliability.
* Develop secure, well\\-documented public APIs and SDKs for consumption by internal and external developers.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions across data pipelines, orchestration, and service APIs.
* Embed robust security controls to protect sensitive data and ensure secure access to AI services.
* Contribute to design reviews, code reviews, and architectural discussions to ensure engineering excellence.
* Mentor junior developers, encourage continuous learning, and contribute to a culture of innovation.
* Work with multiple teams to create AI solutions, which include AI model deployment, training, and AI tooling development.



  





**AI \\& Cloud Expertise** 




  




1. Experience working with Large Language Models (LLMs) and understanding of trade\\-offs between performance, cost, and capability.
2. Understanding of Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG), agent orchestration, prompt engineering, and tool calling.
3. Familiarity with AI standards such as Model Context Protocol (MCP) and Agent2Agent (A2A).
4. Strong knowledge or experience in working with various ML algorithms (regression, classification, clustering, deep learning)
5. Knowledge of AI ethics and regulations (e.g., NIST AI RMF, EU AI Act), and commitment to responsible AI development.

**Core Skills and Qualifications:**

**Why Join AVEVA?**

title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Guard the Gates of the World‚Äôs Most Private Communication Platform** 




 This isn‚Äôt just ‚Äútesting.‚Äù It‚Äôs ensuring WrkTalk meets the gold standard in reliability, performance, and security before it ever reaches a client.
 



  





**Who are we?** 




  





 We are a young product company scaling fast and outgrowing the startup tag‚Äîwith global scale in our crosshairs. We don‚Äôt do ‚Äúokay.‚Äù We give everything we‚Äôve got to build the best communication platform in the world. Our team includes engineers from IIT and other top institutions‚Äîpeople who care deeply about the craft, performance, and purpose. You‚Äôll learn more in 6 months here than most engineers do in 3 years elsewhere. We‚Äôre intense. High\\-strung. Focused. Our team includes engineers from IIT and other top\\-tier
 



 backgrounds. But what defines us is not our degrees‚Äîit‚Äôs our refusal to compromise on quality, performance, or privacy.
 



  





**What are we building?** 




  





 WrkTalk is the world's first zero\\-access, zero\\-spam enterprise communication product that operates on a structural privacy architecture. One that‚Äôs already earned the trust of large enterprises like L\\&T Finance, Adani Group, and Kalyan Jewellers ‚Äì just to name a few of our enterprise clients. This is not an MVP. This is production\\-grade software that secures communication for thousands‚Äîand soon, millions‚Äîof professionals worldwide.
 



  





**What‚Äôs the role?** 




  




* Create, own, and execute comprehensive test cases across functional, non\\-functional, integration, sanity, and regression testing.
* Lead testing strategy for product releases.
* Collaborate with engineers to ensure issues are identified, documented, and resolved quickly.
* Contribute to automation scripts for recurring tests.
* Ensure product security and compliance checks are validated before release.



  





**The tech here is serious.** 




 We work on socket\\-driven comms infrastructure, distributed control towers, multi\\-category encryption, root detection, app kill\\-switches, dynamic guest access, device\\-level lockout, and OOO/ DND logic layered with smart whitelisting. This is not lightweight app dev. This is protocol\\-layer decision\\-making.
 



  





**Who should apply?** 




  




* 3‚Äì6 years of software testing experience, preferably in secure enterprise products.
* Strong in test case design, execution, and defect tracking.
* Strong hands\\-on experience in automation testing using Playwright with JavaScript.
* Excellent analytical and documentation skills.
* Experience with cross\\-browser testing, mobile testing and API testing is a must.
* Familiarity with tools such as Browser Stack, Postman, etc is good to have.
* Experience in JavaScript ,TypeScript, or Java for Automation testing.
* Experience with Load testing/ Stress testing with tools like JMeter, Artillary is a plus



  





**Why should you join?** 




  




* Because you want to set the standards of testing that will ensure global quality
* Because you‚Äôll work directly with established founders, not buried under layers
* Because you‚Äôll ship real, deeply engineered features used by large number of enterprise users
* Because you‚Äôll grow 10x faster here‚Äîin experience, learning, and impact
* And because if you walk this road with us for 3‚Äì4 years, it‚Äôll catapult you into a tech orbit or fame and glory you never imagined



  





**Where are we located?** 




 We‚Äôre based in Navi Mumbai and building for the world.

title: Senior Test Engineer (eCollect)
description:
* **Location:** 
 Al Khobar (Onsite)
* **Industry:** 
 Banking



  




**Role Summary** 

  





 We are seeking a
 **Senior Test Engineer** 
 with
 **mandatory hands\\-on experience in eCollect / Collections Management Systems** 
 within the banking or financial services domain. The role involves end\\-to\\-end testing of collections workflows, payment integrations, reconciliation, and regulatory controls.
 



**Candidates without direct eCollect testing experience will not be considered.** 




  




**Key Responsibilities** 

  





**eCollect Functional Testing (Mandatory)** 




  




* Perform end\\-to\\-end testing of eCollect platforms including:
* Dues \\& receivables generation
* Aging and delinquency buckets
* Promise\\-to\\-Pay (PTP) handling
* Partial payments, settlements, and write\\-offs
* Validate collections lifecycle workflows: pre\\-due, due, post\\-due, soft collections, escalations (call center, field, legal).
* Test rule\\-based engines for payment allocation, prioritization, and exception handling.



  





**Integration \\& Payment Testing** 




  




* Validate integrations with core banking/loan systems, billing systems, and payment gateways.
* Perform reconciliation testing across eCollect, core systems, and finance/GL.
* Validate batch jobs, real\\-time updates, EOD processing, and cut\\-offs.



  





**Data, Reporting \\& Controls** 




  




* Validate outstanding balances, recoveries, aging, and delinquency reports.
* Validate agent and collections performance dashboards.
* Perform
 **SQL\\-based data validation** 
 .
* Validate audit trails, approvals, and access controls.



  





**Test Ownership \\& UAT Support** 




  




* Own test scenarios, test cases, and defect lifecycle management.
* Support business UAT, production readiness, go\\-live, and post\\-go\\-live validation.
* Coordinate with business users, development teams, and product vendors.



  




**Mandatory Skills \\& Experience (Non\\-Negotiable)** 

  




* **7‚Äì10\\+ years** 
 of banking/financial services testing experience.
* **Direct hands\\-on experience testing eCollect platforms (mandatory)** 
 .
* Strong understanding of collections \\& recovery, loan/EMI products, receivables, and delinquency management.
* Functional, integration, UAT, and regression testing expertise.
* **SQL for data validation (mandatory)** 
 .
* API testing experience (Postman / SOAP UI).
* Experience with batch processing and reconciliation flows.



  




**Good to Have** 

  




* Experience with
 **Intellect eCollect** 
 or similar collections platforms.
* Exposure to
 **Saudi / GCC banking regulations** 
 .
* Experience working in onsite banking environments.

title: Senior MLOps Engineer
description:
**About the Company:**




  





 Saint\\-Gobain group through its group company Grindwell Norton Limited has established INDEC \\- an International Delivery Center in Mumbai to provide IT solutions and services to the groups‚Äô businesses Globally
 



  





 INDEC is currently organized into INDEC Application Development, INDEC Infrastructure Management and Cyber Security Management. While INDEC Apps specializes in Software application development and maintenance services (ADM), INDEC Infra specializes in monitoring and managing the key IT infrastructure assets of the group deployed globally across 70 countries worldwide.
 



  





 INDEC provides IT Services and Solutions to the Saint\\-Gobain group through its state\\-of\\-the\\-art delivery centers based at Andheri ‚Äì East in Mumbai. There are approximately 1200\\+ associates working in INDEC currently. INDEC Apps provides software application development and maintenance services across a wide spectrum covering SAP, Java, PHP, .Net, CRM, Mobility, Digital, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Robotic Automation. INDEC Infra on the other hand operates the following service lines: Network Coordination Center (NCC/NOC), Data Center Infrastructure Support, IT Standards, Tools Engineering and Reporting Automation. INDEC Cybersecurity provides 24/7 Security monitoring to detect \\& react on any suspicious activity in Saint\\- Gobain. It provides services on vulnerability scanning, web application firewall, endpoint protection, strong authentication, digital certificate, Win 10 MBAM and SFTS support.
 



  





  





**About the role :**




  





 Saint\\-Gobain is modernizing its Data practices with more and more Artificial Intelligence algorithms and is seeking a senior MLOps Engineer to reinforce Saint\\-Gobain center of excellence in AI \\& GenAI, assisting Saint\\-Gobain Data Science teams worldwide in building and deploying AI applications to maximize the value brought to the Business by Artificial Intelligence applications.
 



  





**In this role, you will:**




  




* Act as an expert, assisting Data Scientists in designing AI solutions, selecting and implementing the right technologies according to their needs
* Move AI applications from prototyping stage to production
* Extend the AI \\& GenAI foundations (Saint\\-Gobain Python libraries for AI \\& GenAI, CI/CD pipelines, reference AI/GenAI architecture, and global AI/Gen AI tools) which will be used by all main Data Science teams in Saint\\-Gobain worldwide, including local AI/GenAI factories
* Deploy and scale AI applications developed by Data Scientists to new Business units
* Ensure the automation of applications \\& models monitoring
* Support end\\-users on the use of Saint\\-Gobain AI \\& GenAI foundations



  





  





**In this role, you will report to:**




  





 INDEC Data \\& AI manager
 



  





  





**In this role, you will interact with:**




  




* Data Scientists from different BUs of Saint\\-Gobain worldwide to guide them on the best use of Saint\\-Gobain AI \\& GenAI technologies and tooling
* Local MLOps engineers in BUs assisting Data Scientists locally, to provide them expertise on AI tooling and methodology
* Business users to support their use of Saint\\-Gobain global AI/GenAI applications



  





**Qualifications:**




  




* MS degree in Data Science
* Proven experience (5\\+ years) in AI Engineering in a cloud environment (Azure / AWS / GCP)



  





**Skills:**




  




* Expertise in MLOps (models re\\-training, labelling \\& monitoring)
* Expertise in Python and ML models optimization.
* Expertise in Cloud AI Services, especially Azure ML
* Good knowledge in Generative AI architectures and solutions
* Good knowledge in applications industrialization (Dockers / Kubernetes)
* Good knowledge in DevOps (Git, CI/CD pipelines)
* Fluent in English and takes initiatives



  





**SELECTION PROCESS:** 



1. Interested Candidates are mandatorily required to apply through the listing on Jigya. Only applications received through Jigya will be evaluated further.
2. Shortlisted candidates may be required to appear in an Online Assessment administered by Jigya on behalf of Saint\\-Gobain INDEC
3. Candidates selected after the screening test will be interviewed by Saint\\-Gobain INDEC
